Html: I'm thrilled to see this very useful tool given new life. Is there a particular reason why its packaged as RAR, though? It's not a very convenient compression format.
Seriously?  I have to go download a RAR client to install this.  That sucks.

Windows does not support .rar files?!

My company does now allow me to download anything that will open rar files. What is wrong with MSI or ZIP?

Total waste of time.
